Wizard Skills: Skill Trained (Arcana; Choose 7 from any)
Assurance (Crafting): May forgo rolling a Crafting check for an automatic 34
Conceal Spell: May hide spellcasting from observers with a successful Stealth vs. Perception, plus a successful Deception vs. Perception for verbal spells
Quick Recognition: May use a skill with master proficiency to Recognize a Spell as a free action 1/rd
Recognize Spell: (R) May gain guaranteed success in recognizing an unknown common spell of up to level 2/4/6/10 with trained/expert/master/legendary proficiency in the connected skill
Rock Runner: Does not suffer flat-footed when using Acrobatics to Balance on stone and earth; successes to do so are critical successes
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 208 Armor Class: 38 (dexterity; expert)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (+26 1 P R20'; dexterity; trained); Dart (+26 1d4+4 P R20'; dexterity; trained); Morningstar (+26 1d6+4 B/P; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Defensive Robes: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Dwarven Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Battle Axe; Pick; Warhammer; Dwarf Weapons)
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Battle Axe; Pick; Warhammer)/Treats dwarf weapons as one category simpler
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Weapon Proficiency (Halfling Sling Staff): Attack Trained (Halfling Sling Staff)

Weapon Proficiency (Shortbow): Attack Trained (Shortbow)
Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons): Attack Trained (Simple Weapons)
Dwarven Weapon Cunning: Critical hits with a battle axe, pick, warhammer, or dwarf weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon dwarf weapons
Weapon Specialization: +2/+3/+4 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency

Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 13; A10: 2; A1: 11; A2: 11; A3: 11; A4: 11; A5: 11; A6: 11; A7: 11; A8: 11; A9: 11 Focus Points: 4 Attack: Arcane: +33 (intelligence; legendary); Divine Innate: +26 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane: 43 (intelligence; legendary); Divine Innate: 36 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Augment Summoning (A1 Con): (1) R30' Target summoned creature gains +1 to all checks for 1 min
Call Of The Grave (A1 Nec): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts sickened 1 (critical success sickened 2 and slowed 1)
Charming Words (A1 Enc): (1) R30' Prevents target from taking hostile actions against the caster for 1 rd (save Will target suffers -1 attack and damage vs. caster; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned 1)
Diviner's Sight (A1 Div): (1) R30' Target may substitute caster's d20 roll for a saving throw or skill check within 1 rd
Force Bolt (A1 Evo): (1) R30' Inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 inflicts +1d4+1 HP)
Hand Of The Apprentice (A1 Evo): (1) R500' Allows the caster to make a remote attack with a melee weapon, inflicting +1 damage
Meld Into Stone (D3 Tra): (2) Allows the caster to enter the touched stone, retaining the ability to hear outside sounds, for 10 min
Physical Boost (A1 Tra): (1) Touched gains +2 on next Acrobatics, Athletics, Fortitude, or Reflex check within next rd
Protective Ward (A1 Abj): (1) 5' emanation gives +1 AC while sustained for up to 1 min; radius increases by 5' for every sustain
Shifting Form (A4 Tra): (1) Caster gains choice of +20' Speed, climb or swim at half Speed, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, or claws that inflict 1d8 HP slashing for 1 min
Warped Terrain (A1 Ill): (1) 60' 5' burst (10'/15' burst for 2/3 actions) appears to be difficult terrain for 1 min (heightened 4th may affect air instead of surface)
Magic Notes:
Abjuration: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Protective Ward arcane spell
Advanced School Spell: Knows the Shifting Form spell/+1 Focus Points
Arcane School: Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Archwizard's Might: +1 10th level spell slot
Archwizard's Spellcraft: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Conjuration: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Augment Summoning arcane spell
Divination: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Diviner's Sight arcane spell
Enchantment: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Charming Words arcane spell
Evocation: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Force Bolt arcane spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Arcane)
Hand Of The Apprentice: Knows the Hand Of The Apprentice arcane spell/Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Illusion: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Warped Terrain arcane spell
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Arcane)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Arcane)
Necromancy: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Call Of The Grave arcane spell
Stonewalker: Knows the Meld Into Stone divine innate spell; may cast it 1/day
Transmutation: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Physical Boost arcane spell
Universal Versatility: +1 Focus Points
Abjuration: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Abjuration spell
Arcane Spellcasting: May learn spells from the arcane tradition
Bespell Weapon: (F) May cast a non-cantrip spell to also cause a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until end of turn; damage type depends on spell school
Bizarre Magic: Others suffer +5 DC to Recognize Spells and Identify Magic on self spells
Bond Conservation: (1) May use Drain Bonded Item to cast another spell 2 levels lower by the end of next turn
Bonded Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Cantrip Expansion: May prepare two additional cantrips each day or add two additional cantrips to spell repertoire
Clever Counterspell: May Counterspell with a -2 penalty a known spell using any spell that shares a non-tradition trait with it
Conjuration: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Conjuration spell
Counterspell: (R) May expend a spell slot to counteract a spell with the same spell
Divination: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Divination spell
Drain Bonded Item: (R) May cast an expended spell using power stored in a possession 1/day
Effortless Concentration: (F) May extend the duration of 1 spell
Enchantment: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Enchantment spell
Eschew Materials: May replace spell material components with sigils drawn in the air
Evocation: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Evocation spell
Illusion: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Illusion spell
Infinite Possibilities: May prepare a spell slot to allow casting of any known spell of 2 levels lower
Linked Focus: Draining a bonded item to cast a spell restores 1 Focus Point
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-level Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-level during Seek
Metamagic Mastery: May use a 1-action metamagic effect as a free action
Metamagical Experimentation: May select 1 metamagic feat of up to level 10 to use each day
Necromancy: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Necromancy spell
Overwhelming Energy: (1) May cast a spell that ignores resistance 20 to choice of energy
Quickened Casting: (F) May reduce the time required to cast a spell of level 8 or lower by 1 action 1/day
Reach Spell: (1) May extend spell range by 30'
Reflect Spell: May have a successful Counterspell inflict the spell effects on the caster
Reprepare Spell: May spend 10 min to prepare a cast spell or another spell of the same level
Scroll Savant: May prepare 4 temporary scrolls with spells up to level 8 each day
Silent Spell: (1) May cast a spell without its verbal components
Spell Blending: May use 2 spell slots from a level to prepare a spell two levels higher/May use a spell slot to prepare 2 cantrips
Spell Combination: May use 1 spell slot of each level above 2nd to cast a combination of two spells of 2 levels lower
Spell Penetration: Targets reduce any status bonus to saves vs. self spells by 1
Spell Substitution: May use a 10-minute process to replace 1 prepared spell with a different spell
Spell Tinker: (2) May alter the ongoing effect choice of a spell cast on self, reducing its remaining duration by half
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Superior Bond: May use Drain Bonded Item to cast another spell of up to level 8 1/day
Transmutation: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Transmutation spell
Universal Versatility: May select a school spell during daily prep and Refocus
Universalist: May use Drain Bonded Item 1 per spell level/Knows 1 additional 1st-level spell
Widen Spell: (1) May increase the effect of a 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', and the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Notes
